name: Ghostman: The Council Calamity
description:
Ghostman: The Council Calamity is the first adventure game created by Jeklin Games, styled after classic lucasarts adventure games!

Play as Rebut, a sentient droid in a quest to save your good friend, Ghostman!, Travel across the galaxy, making friends, enemies, and frenimies!

Features:
A large cast of unique characters!

10 interesting planets to explore!

Exclamation points!

A variety of interesting, tricky yet fair puzzles!

No Drm! (Please don't pirate it though!)

Hidden Conspiracies!

Open Conspiracies!

Explosions!

Robots!
